meanings.sent1: The man had a swarty complexion from spending hours in the sun.

meanings.definition: Having a dark or dusky color.
meanings.sent1: The swarty cat blended perfectly into the night, unseen by passersby.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a swarty forest with deep, mysterious hues.
meanings.sent3: The swarty curtains in the room made it feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a swarty sheen, reflecting the dim light of the room.
meanings.sent5: The swarty rocks along the shore created a stark contrast against the white sand.
